org.apache.ambari.server.state.kerberos

Class KerberosConfigurationDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.state.kerberos.AbstractKerberosDescriptor
      • org.apache.ambari.server.state.kerberos.KerberosConfigurationDescriptor

  • public class KerberosConfigurationDescriptor
extends AbstractKerberosDescriptor
    KerberosConfigurationDescriptor is an implementation of an AbstractKerberosDescriptor that encapsulates data related to an Ambari configuration block.

    A KerberosConfigurationDescriptor has the following properties:

    • type
    • properties

    The following is an example of a JSON structure that will yield a valid KerberosConfigurationDescriptor 

       {
    "core-site": {
      "hadoop.security.authentication": "kerberos",
      "hadoop.rpc.protection": "authentication; integrity; privacy",
      "hadoop.security.authorization": "true"
    }
   }

    In this implementation, AbstractKerberosDescriptor.name will hold the KerberosConfigurationDescriptor#type value

        public String getProperty(String name)
        Gets the value of the configuration property with the specified name
        Parameters:
        name - a String declaring the name of the property to retrieve
        Returns:
        a String or null if the property value is not found

      • putProperty

        public void putProperty(String name,
                        String value)
        Adds or updates the value of the configuration property with the specified name

        If the property exists, it will be overwritten; else a new entry will be created.

        Parameters:
        name - a String declaring the name of the property to set
        value - a String containing the value of the property

      • update

        public void update(KerberosConfigurationDescriptor updates)
        Updates this KerberosConfigurationDescriptor with data from another KerberosConfigurationDescriptor

        Properties will be updated if the relevant updated values are not null.

        Parameters:
        updates - the KerberosConfigurationDescriptor containing the updated values
